guyzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzz i found the soloution for the keygen problemmmmmmmmmmmmmm this is what u need to do when u open the keygen it show that it has a virus and then ur antivirus want rto remove it so if ur having win 7 with microsoft security essintiales chose the act : allow and for the others who dont have microsoft security essintiales just turn off ur antivirus for couple of mins and after u write ur activition key..... bla bla bla finish putting the key ..... and then just activate ur anti virus again and well thats it and u can deleate the keygen only so the antuvirus will stop bugging u

the solution is simple for that shitty keygen prob.
jz open the settings of ur antivirus and put the keygen file in exclude list and it will then open. nw put the harware ID and it will generate the code..nw put your code and play the game...njoiiiii
